title: Ordinary Diff Eqns II
description: This sequence develops the qualitative theory for systems of differential equations. Topics include stability, Lyapunov functions, Floquet theory, attractors, invariant manifolds, bifurcation theory, and normal forms.  Second of two courses.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:

prerequisites: MATH 6307 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
